verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Redeemed! Redeemed
A new life to begin!
Redeemed! Redeemed
Eternal life to win!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Redeemed I know by Jesus’ blood,
His love o’erwhelms me like a flood
Redeemed from all
my guilt and shame.
Redeemed! O praise His name.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Redeemed! Redeemed!
Oh, sing the joyful strain!
Give praise, Give praise,
and glory to His name;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Who gave His blood
our souls to save,
And purchased freedom
for the slave!
And purchased freedom
for the slave.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Redeemed! Redeemed!
The word has bro’t repose,
And joy, And joy,
That each redeemed one knows,
Who sees his sins on Jesus laid

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And knows His blood
the ransom paid,
And knows His blood
the ransom paid.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Redeemed! Redeemed!
O joy that I should be In Christ,
In Christ, from sin forever free
Forever free to praise His name.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Who bore for me the guilt
and shame,
Who bore for me the guilt
and shame.
